Bringing the World to Penn and Penn to the World Penn Global provides strategic direction to the University of Pennsylvania on its global endeavors, with a focus on the efficient investment of university resources. Encompassing seven reporting offices, Penn Global leverages its broad and deep expertise to advise the University on its global activities and to collaborate with Penn’s schools, centers, communities and partners to deliver a comprehensive suite of global programming that generates positive impact around the world.   Penn Global Read More @PennGlobal Follow Us 10th Anniversary Highlights (AY2022-2023) Celebrating 10 Years of Penn Global Celebrating Penn Global's 10th anniversary Looking back at 10 years of global engagement Celebrating Penn's international students Recognizing the work and impact of our partners Reconnecting with stakeholders abroad Advancing Penn's global engagement Assessing the future of global higher education Bringing the world to Penn & Penn to the world Celebrating Penn Global's 10th anniversary 2022 marked 10 years since the inception of Penn Global - a decade since the adoption of the University’s first global strategic framework. To commemorate, Penn Global hosted a series of events to highlight the transformative impact of Penn Global on the University and celebrate Penn’s commitment to global engagement. View Photos from Events Looking back at 10 years of global engagement The hub for all things global on campus looks back at its impact over the decade and ahead to what the next 10 years of research, policy, and engagement with the world will bring. Read More at Penn Today Celebrating Penn's international students Penn’s campus community includes students from all parts of the globe, bringing their unique experiences and soaking in all the University has to offer. Read More at Penn Today Recognizing the work and impact of our partners In October 2022, Penn Global hosted a reception to celebrate its 10th anniversary and recognize the deep impact of our many campus partners and international stakeholders in advancing Penn's global mission. View Photos from the Reception Reconnecting with stakeholders abroad Penn Global traveled around the world to reconnect with the Penn community abroad and engage students, alumni and global partners around the University's global mission, and celebrate the Penn's long-standing commitment to global engagement. View More Photos on Instagram Advancing Penn's global engagement As part of Penn's global mission, UPIASI, CASI, and Penn Global partnered to host the Penn India Engagement Forum in Delhi, India in January 2023 to address the challenges and opportunities in India's post-Covid recovery and onward development. Read More at ANI Assessing the future of global higher education Organized by Penn Global and the Graduate School of Education, the conference brought together leaders from higher education, government, corporations and other entities to consider the range of challenges and opportunities acing globally oriented colleges and universities. Read More at Penn Today Bringing the world to Penn & Penn to the world Our mission is to bring the world to Penn and Penn to the world. Learn how Penn Global has helped to shape the University as a global institution over the last 10 years as it prepares for the next ten years of global engagement.
